name: The Next Dimension v.0.1
description:
An atmospheric puzzle game where you are a small circle who must find a way to break free from the restraints of a 2 dimensional mind and begin life in a 3D world.

This was my first attempt at 3D and I figured there was no better palce to learn than for a game jam. It was fun and I learned a lot. It does not function very well and has quite a few bugs.
